name: The Seven Heavenly Princes[Demo]
description:
The Heavenly Princes is a free, fantasy visual novel made by fans of Chinese drama. It’s a gender-bent version of a popular Chinese mythology, the Seven Fairies. According to legend, the Heavenly Emperor has seven sons. All of them are attractive and unique in their own ways. In this dating sim, you get to play as two different main characters, either a princess or the daughter of a restaurant owner. Each of their routes includes three romantic interests. As a human girl, will you ever fall in love with the son of Heaven? Featuring Xiao Zhan, Wang Yibo, Jackson Yee, Leo Wu, Karry Wang, and  Huang Junjie.  Demo available in both Chinese and English.

 DISCLAIMER: We do not own anything besides the script. It’s a fan work made by fans and for fans. 

风流倜傥七仙君是一部由喜爱中国古装剧的粉丝们所做的一部恋爱游戏。这个游戏是中国古代神话七仙女的性转版。 相传天帝有七个英俊的儿子，其中最小的儿子七郎与凡人董永在一起，犯了天规，被贬为庶人。在这个恋爱模拟游戏中，你将扮演两个不同的主要角色，刁蛮公主或者小家碧玉。 她们各自可以攻略3个仙君。 作为人类女孩，你会喜欢上天帝之子吗？ 仙君们有肖战，王一博，易烊千玺，吴磊，王俊凯，与黄俊捷。 

 DISCLAIMER: 这是一部由粉丝为粉丝做的非盈利游戏，我们希望能把幸福感带给所有人。除了剧本，我们不拥有任何东西。
